definition-item.definition-title: WATER-CLOSETS OR URINALS WITH FLUSHING DEVICES; FLUSHING VALVES THEREFOR

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Devices for receiving excrements and urine which are cleaned by water flushing.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Closets or urinals without connection to the water supply or waste system
Seats or covers for all kinds of toilets
Portable urination aids for medical use
Disintegrating of garbage in general

section-body.paragraph-text: Examples of places where the subject matter of this place is covered when specially adapted, used for a particular purpose, or incorporated in a larger system:

table-column.paragraph-text: Arrangement of water closets specially adapted to motor vehicles or trailers
Arrangement of water closets specially adapted to railway carriages
Flushed water closets specially adapted to ships
Flushed water closets specially adapted to aircrafts

definition-item.definition-title: Water flushing devices with cisterns {; Setting up a range of flushing devices or water-closets; Combinations of several flushing devices}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Constructional aspects and component parts of flushing cisterns;
Inlet and outlet valves specially adapted for flushing cisterns.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Toilets and urinals with pressurized flushing system
Combination of toilet bowls with wash basins, cleaning devices for chamber-pots or similar devices
Self-closing valves in general
Float actuation for valves in general
Measuring water level in general

section-body.paragraph-text: Examples of places where the subject matter of this place is covered when specially adapted, used for a particular purpose, or incorporated in a larger system:

table-column.paragraph-text: Portable toilets with water reservoir for flushing
Arrangement of water closets with cisterns specially adapted to motor vehicles or trailers
Arrangement of water closets with cisterns specially adapted to railway carriages
Water closets with cisterns specially adapted to ships
Water closets with cisterns specially adapted to aircrafts
Combinations of wash basins, sinks, urinals, toilets or similar devices

section-body.paragraph-text: E03D1/02 is not used, documents are only classified in the corresponding subgroups.
Flushing valves for discharging different quantities of water are classified in E03D1/14 and, if applicable, in the corresponding subgroup E03D1/30 - E03D1/308.
Simple devices for reducing amount of flushing water per flush (e.g. brick in cistern) are classified in E03D1/14.
Water monitoring devices, leak and/or overflow detection are classified in E03D1/00.

definition-item.definition-title: Flushing devices operated by pressure of the water supply system {flushing valves not connected to the water-supply main, also if air is blown in the water seal for a quick flushing}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Flushing valves arranged in the water supply line; other devices for flushing with pressurized water
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Self-closing valves not specially adapted to water closet flushing

section-body.paragraph-text: Examples of places where the subject matter of this place is covered when specially adapted, used for a particular purpose, or incorporated in a larger system:

table-column.paragraph-text: Pressure flushing valves within vacuum flushing systems

section-body.paragraph-text: Flushing valves are generally as well classified in F16K.

definition-item.definition-title: Special constructions of flushing devices (in motor vehicles or trailers B60R15/00; in railway carriages B61D35/00; in ships B63B29/14; in aircraft B64D11/02), {e.g. closed flushing system}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Devices and methods for transmission of actuating force to flushing valve; flushing devices working with greywater or other cleaning fluids
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Construction of flushed water closets specially adapted to motor vehicles or trailers
Construction of flushed water closets specially adapted to railway carriages
Construction of flushed water closets specially adapted to ships
Construction of flushed water closets specially adapted to aircrafts
Handles, levers and knobs in general

section-body.paragraph-text: Examples of places where the subject matter of this place is covered when specially adapted, used for a particular purpose, or incorporated in a larger system:

table-column.paragraph-text: Collection and storage of greywater

section-body.paragraph-text: Constructive adaptations of cisterns for using greywater are classified in E03D5/003. Other aspects of greywater collection or use are classified in E03B1/04.

Pusher plates, their mounting to an opening in a wall or the like and the elements for transmitting the actuating force to the flushing valve are classified in E03D5/028, whereas constructional details of built-in cisterns, also frames for fixing pusher plates to wall openings, are classified in E03D1/0125.

definition-item.definition-title: Wheeled lavatories (wheeled closets without flushing A47K11/00; construction of land vehicles B62)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Mobile toilets with provisions for flushing.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Constructional details of buildings for public toilets

section-body.paragraph-text: This class covers the constructional details of single portable toilets, e.g. for outdoor use, trailers for providing toilet facilities as well as portable public toilet cabins as far as aspects of the toilet and its water connection are concerned. Aspects of construction of the housing itself are classified in E04H1/1205.

definition-item.definition-title: Sanitary or other accessories for lavatories (hand tools for cleaning the toilet bowl A47K11/10; seats or covers for closets A47K13/00; body supports, other than seats for closets A47K17/02; devices for preventing contamination of drinking-water pipes E03C1/10 ){; Devices for cleaning or disinfecting the toilet room or the toilet bowl; Devices for eliminating smells (cleaning, disinfecting or deodorising the seat A47K13/30)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

Accessories enhancing use comfort or security of water closets or urinals, the accessories being specially adapted for flushed toilets: devices for cleaning or disinfecting the toilet room or the toilet bowl or for eliminating smells.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Hand tools for cleaning the toilet bowl
Seats or covers for all kinds of toilets
Cleaning, disinfecting or deodorising the seat
Toilet and urinal accessories without connection to water supply and waste pipe
Body supports, other than seats for closets
Baths and bidets for therapeutic use
Deodorizing of rooms in general
Chemical composition of deodorising agents
Baths and spraying heads for subaquatic intestinal cleaning
Chemical composition of disinfecting agents
Devices for preventing contamination of drinking water pipes

section-body.paragraph-text: Examples of places where the subject matter of this place is covered when specially adapted, used for a particular purpose, or incorporated in a larger system:

table-column.paragraph-text: Ventilated toilet seats

section-body.paragraph-text: Disinfecting devices, whether only dispensing while flushing or disinfecting without functional relationship to a flushing action are classified according to their placement in the flushing system in subclass E03D9/03 and parallel in E03D2009/024, E03D2009/026 and/or E03D2009/028.
Dispensers mounted inside the cistern and dispensing into the overflow pipe are classified in E03D9/037.
E03D9/05 and E03D9/052 are used indifferently and search should always take place in both groups.
Ventilation of toilets via the seat are classified in E03D9/05 and in A47K13/307.

definition-item.definition-title: Other component parts of water-closets (pipe-joints or couplings in general F16L ){, e.g. noise-reducing means in the flushing system (noise-reducing means in combination with flushing valves E03D9/14), flushing pipes mounted in the bowl, seals for the bowl outlet, devices preventing overflow of the bowl contents; devices forming a water seal in the bowl after flushing, devices eliminating obstructions in the bowl outlet or preventing backflow of water and excrements from the waterpipe}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

Constructional details of water closet bowls and discharge pipes; Mounting of bowls or other parts of a water closet to a support: e.g. noise-reducing means in the flushing system, flushing pipes mounted in the bowl, seals for the bowl outlet, devices preventing overflow of the bowl contents; devices forming a water seal in the bowl after flushing, devices eliminating obstructions in the bowl outlet or preventing backflow of water and excrements from the waterpipe.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Cisterns specially adapted to be combined with at least another sanitary device
Noise-reducing means in combination with flushing valves
Constructional details of flushed urinals
Constructional details of urinals without connection to water supply system
Pipe-joints or couplings in general

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Mounting frames for washbasins

section-body.paragraph-text: Toilet bowls having features for better distribution of flushing water are classified in E03D11/02 or lower and in E03D2201/40.
Siphons forming part of the bowl are classified in E03D11/02, siphons independent of the bowl are classified in E03D11/18.
E03D2201/20, E03D2201/30, E03D2201/40 are used to mark information of the respective feature to be used for a future search without this feature forming the invention.

definition-item.definition-title: Urinals (without flushing devices A47K11/00 ){; Means for connecting the urinal to the flushing pipe and the wastepipe; Splashing shields for urinals}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Constructional features of urinals with connection to water supply and/or waste system; Accessories specially adapted to such urinals.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Urinals without flushing devices, i.e. without connection to water supply and waste system
Siphons for other sealants than water

section-body.paragraph-text: Siphons with other sealants than water specially adapted for urinals are classified also in E03D13/005 besides E03C1/281.
Remote controlled flushing for urinals is classified in E03D5/105.
